title: Why are they working on a new champion when they need to fix others?
body: Why cant you guys just fix {{champion:69}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:37}}  before shelling out a new champ? wtf is this team's philosophy? i mean, you're constantly working on other things and not fixing the most important parts

replies.body: Entirely different teams within Riot, do realize.
the team that designs new champions isnt the team that updates older ones......
